#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;

typedef struct node
{
	struct node *c[200];
	char ch;
}node;

node *head;
int count=0;
int max=0;
void insert(char c);

int main()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	int i,j;
	char s[101];
	node *trie;
	trie=(node*)malloc(sizeof(node));

	for(i=0;i<200;i++)
	{
		trie->c[i]=NULL;
	}
	head=trie;
	int k;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%s",s);
		for(j=0;j<strlen(s);j++)
		{
			insert(s[j]);
		}
		head=trie;
		count=0;
	}
	printf("%d\n",max);
	return 0;
}
void insert(char c)
{
	if(head->c[(int)c]!=NULL)
	{
		count++;
		head=head->c[(int)c];
	}
	else
	{
		head->c[(int)c]=(node*)malloc(sizeof(node));
		for(int k=0;k<200;k++)
		{
			head->c[(int)c]->c[k]=NULL;
		}
		head=head->c[(int)c];
		head->ch=c;
	}
	if(count>max)
		max=count;
}
